content: What is the process for ballot resolutions now - can we/should we generate a resolution spreadsheet to load on the ballot desktop and ask for withdrawals? Is this documented somewhere?

Good morning Hugh, specification feedback is documented here https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/Specification+Feedback (note the tutorials at the top right of the page). If you have further questions after checking out the documentation, please ping them back in here! Cheers.
@Hugh Glover Creating the resolution spreadsheet isn't fully done yet - on my near-term list of activities (i.e. next week)
